data.lyric:
[ti:Hate Me (Explicit)]
[ar:Trippie Redd/Youngboy Never Broke Again]
[al:A Love Letter To You 4 (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Hate Me (Explicit) - Trippie Redd/Youngboy Never Broke Again
[00:03.00]Lyrics by：Michael Lamar White II/Kentrell Gaulden
[00:06.00]Composed by：Michael Lamar White II
[00:09.00]Trippie Redd/YoungBoy Never Broke Again：
[00:14.87]You actin' like you hate me
[00:17.51]Hate me yeah
[00:18.71]Where is your love
[00:22.77]You do too much complaining
[00:25.38]Complaining yeah
[00:26.84]Where is your trust
[00:29.94]Trust trust
[00:32.24]Flyin' in a Wraith yeah
[00:33.73]Pass by time through the day yeah
[00:35.83]Skrrt
[00:36.26]Blinded with hate yeah
[00:37.65]I ain't got time for the chase yeah
[00:40.02]Just me and my bae yeah
[00:41.50]Wan' shop get the racks out the safe yeah
[00:43.93]We gon' party too late yeah
[00:45.43]Do the dash in the whip on the jakes yeah
[00:47.27]Skrrt
[00:47.37]YoungBoy Never Broke Again：
[00:47.78]Ice tray diamonds on froze get a migraine
[00:49.68]Life on the edge live it up on the high lane
[00:51.64]Me and Trippie Redd back to back on the same thing
[00:53.63]Late night turnt in the club doing my thing
[00:55.61]Sip drank get a cup I'ma pour the whole thing
[00:57.63]Shawty playin' games she don't wanna sell her soul man
[00:59.62]Sayin' that she love me but I'm knowing that she don't man
[01:01.59]Playing back and forth probably thinking that I'm dumb man
[01:02.68]Trippie Redd/YoungBoy Never Broke Again：
[01:03.09]N***a I ain't worried 'bout a b***h n***a worry 'bout a check
[01:05.50]Worry 'bout a b***h n***a worry 'bout a check
[01:07.24]N***a VVS diamonds lil' n***a had to flex
[01:09.24]Them VVS diamonds young n***a had to flex
[01:11.17]N***a hoppin' out the 'Rari then I'm hoppin' in the jet
[01:13.22]Then I'm hoppin' out the 'Rari then I'm hoppin' on the plane
[01:14.51]Bad lil' b***h all on my d**k I want the neck ayy
[01:18.40]She want the d**k I don't want sex I want the neck ayy
[01:21.46]I want the neck
[01:22.35]Me and YoungBoy tossing these h*es we want the neck ayy
[01:25.24]And we want the neck
[01:26.33]Whole full moon in the middle of the day
[01:28.07]I done jumped out my sleep heard the phone go ring
[01:30.06]Back to back we be flippin' these h*es on a train
[01:32.02]Keep a pole we never be playin' no games
[01:33.89]Bah
[01:34.34]Diamonds gon' shine put an eight on my chain
[01:35.84]Yeah
[01:35.97]I done ran up that money stayed true to the gang
[01:38.26]Diamonds they shining that's all through the rain
[01:40.23]Through all the mud and through all the pain
[01:42.09]Yeah
[01:42.32]Actin' like you hate me
[01:44.82]Hate me
[01:46.11]Where is your love
[01:48.04]Where is your love yeah
[01:49.96]You do too much complaining
[01:52.33]Too much complaining
[01:54.14]Where is your trust
[01:56.67]Where is your trust yeah
[01:59.55]Flyin' in a Wraith yeah
[02:01.16]Pass by time through the day yeah
[02:03.12]Skrrt
[02:03.54]Blinded with hate yeah
[02:04.93]I ain't got time for the chase yeah
[02:07.31]Just me and my bae yeah
[02:08.76]Wan' shop get the racks out the safe yeah
[02:11.02]We gon' party too late yeah
[02:12.70]Do the dash in the whip on the jakes yeah
data.trans:
[ti:Hate Me (Explicit)]
[ar:Trippie Redd/Youngboy Never Broke Again]
[al:A Love Letter To You 4 (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:03.00]//
[00:06.00]//
[00:09.00]//
[00:14.87]你好像很恨我
[00:17.51]恨我
[00:18.71]你的爱心在哪里
[00:22.77]你太喜欢抱怨了
[00:25.38]抱怨
[00:26.84]你的信任在哪里
[00:29.94]信任
[00:32.24]开着劳斯莱斯魅影飞驰
[00:33.73]每一天都一晃而过
[00:35.83]//
[00:36.26]被仇恨蒙蔽了双眼
[00:37.65]我没时间和你玩追逐游戏
[00:40.02]只有我和我的宝贝
[00:41.50]想去购物 从保险箱里拿出钞票
[00:43.93]我们要狂欢到很晚
[00:45.43]开着车急速飞驰
[00:47.27]//
[00:47.37]//
[00:47.78]冰凉的钻石贴在我身上 让我得了偏头痛
[00:49.68]危机四伏的生活 就是要过得惊险刺激
[00:51.64]我和Trippie Redd合作 一起做同一件事
[00:53.63]深夜时分 让夜店里的人都跟着我嗨起来
[00:55.61]喝酒 来个杯子 我要把酒杯装满
[00:57.63]姑娘总在闹 她不想出卖灵魂 朋友
[00:59.62]她说她爱我 但我知道她不爱
[01:01.59]跟我拉拉扯扯 她可能觉得我傻
[01:02.68]//
[01:03.09]兄弟 我不在乎女人 我在乎的是钱
[01:05.50]在乎什么女人 兄弟 在乎钞票啊
[01:07.24]这么漂亮的钻石 小兄弟 我必须得炫耀
[01:09.24]钻石好漂亮 兄弟 我必须得炫耀
[01:11.17]我从法拉利上下来 然后登上飞机
[01:13.22]我从法拉利上下来 然后坐上飞机
[01:14.51]漂亮妞蜂拥而至 我要和她们好好玩
[01:18.40]她想直入主题 但我不想 我就想简单玩一玩
[01:21.46]简单玩一玩
[01:22.35]我和YoungBoy身边姑娘多得很 想怎样玩就怎样玩
[01:25.24]我们想怎样玩就怎样玩
[01:26.33]正午时分也能看到满月
[01:28.07]我刚醒过来 就听到手机响
[01:30.06]我们两个在火车上 和这些娘们玩得很尽兴
[01:32.02]随身带着武器 我们从来不跟人开玩笑
[01:33.89]//
[01:34.34]钻石会发光 必须镶在我的项链上
[01:35.84]//
[01:35.97]我挣到了很多钱 对帮派从来不虚伪
[01:38.26]钻石闪闪发光 那是经历风吹雨打后的结果
[01:40.23]走过泥泞的道路 体验过痛苦的生活
[01:42.09]//
[01:42.32]你好像很恨我
[01:44.82]恨我
[01:46.11]你的爱心在哪里
[01:48.04]你的爱心在哪里
[01:49.96]你太喜欢抱怨了
[01:52.33]太喜欢抱怨
[01:54.14]你的信任在哪里
[01:56.67]你的信任在哪里
[01:59.55]开着劳斯莱斯魅影飞驰
[02:01.16]每一天都一晃而过
[02:03.12]//
[02:03.54]被仇恨蒙蔽了双眼
[02:04.93]我没时间和你玩追逐游戏
[02:07.31]只有我和我的宝贝
[02:08.76]想去购物 从保险箱里拿出钞票
[02:11.02]我们要狂欢到很晚
[02:12.70]开着车急速飞驰
